Function reference

Accessing Hex Codes

Functions to obtain the hex codes of the various colours used in the MRC HGU colour theme

hgu_dark()
Hex Value Of HGU Dark Blue
hgu_light()
Hex Value Of HGU Light Blue
hgu_mid()
Hex Value Of HGU Mid Blue
hgu_palette()
Hex Value Colour Palette
hgu_palette_func_gen()
Generate The Palette Function For The HGU Blues
hgu_palette_n()
Get Any Number Of Colours From The MRC HGU Blue Palette
mrc_dark_blue()
Hex Value Of MRC Dark Blue
mrc_darkish_blue()
Hex Value Of MRC Darkish Blue
mrc_gray()
Hex Value Of MRC Gray
mrc_green()
Hex Value Of MRC Green
mrc_grey()
Hex Value Of MRC Grey
mrc_mid_blue()
Hex Value Of MRC Mid Blue
mrc_red()
Hex Value Of MRC Red
mrc_yellow()
Hex Value Of MRC Yellow

Altering ggplot2 Plots

Functions to use as layers when creating a ggplot2 plot to automatically set colours to those used in the MRC HGU colour theme

scale_colour_gradient2_hgu()
Scale Colours With A Gradient
scale_colour_gradient_hgu()
Scale Colours With A Gradient
scale_colour_hgu()
Colour Ggplot By MRC HGU Blue Colour Palette
scale_colour_hgu2()
Assign Discrete HGU 2 Colour Palette
scale_colour_hgu2_low_high()
Assign Discrete HGU 2 Colour Palette
scale_colour_hgu2_low_mid()
Assign Discrete HGU 2 Colour Palette
scale_colour_hgu2_mid_high()
Assign Discrete HGU 2 Colour Palette
scale_colour_hgu3()
Assign Discrete HGU 3 Colour Palette
scale_fill_gradient2_hgu()
Scale Fill With A Gradient
scale_fill_gradient_hgu()
Scale Fill With A Gradient
scale_fill_hgu()
Colour Ggplot By MRC HGU Blue Colour Palette
scale_fill_hgu2()
Assign Discrete HGU 2 Colour Fill Palette
scale_fill_hgu2_low_high()
Assign Discrete HGU 2 Colour Fill Palette
scale_fill_hgu2_low_mid()
Assign Discrete HGU 2 Colour Fill Palette
scale_fill_hgu2_mid_high()
Assign Discrete HGU 2 Colour Fill Palette
scale_fill_hgu3()
Assign Discrete HGU 3 Colour Fill Palette
